name: tripmateai
description: TripMate AI is an AI-powered web application that helps groups plan trips effortlessly. It provides intelligent itinerary suggestions, optimized routes, expense tracking, and real-time collaboration to make travel planning smooth and enjoyable.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix client" "npm run dev --prefix server"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix client && npm run build --prefix server
scripts.start: npm run start --prefix client & npm run start --prefix server
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
